infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photos so you can upload a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We may save edited photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need camera access so you can take a new profile picture.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow 34thstreet to access your photos so you can upload a profile picture.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow 34thstreet to access your camera to take a new profile picture.
